resources.string: This app requires your device to be enrolled using Microsoft Intune and to be compliant with your companyâ€™s policies. Contact your IT Department for help.
Before you can use your work account with this app, you must install the free Intune Company Portal app. Tap “Go to store” to continue.

Before you can use your work account with this app, you must install the free Intune Company Portal app from the Google Play Store. The store is not currently enabled on this device. Install and enable the Google Play Store, and then try again.
